tier_A_rule: exp_lcb_holdout >= 0 AND effective_edge >= 0 AND trades_per_month_holdout >= 5 AND pf_adj_holdout >= 1.1 AND max_drawdown_holdout <= 0.15 AND exposure_ratio >= 0.02
tier_B_rule: exp_lcb_holdout >= 0 AND effective_edge >= 0 AND trades_per_month_holdout >= 2 AND pf_adj_holdout >= 1.05 AND max_drawdown_holdout <= 0.2 AND exposure_ratio >= 0.02
